Reference

All functions

print(<spp_raw>) print(<spp_raw_multi>) print(<spp_cites_leg>) print(<spp_cites_leg_multi>) print(<spp_distr>) print(<spp_distr_multi>) print(<spp_eu_leg>) print(<spp_eu_leg_multi>) print(<spp_refs>) print(<spp_refs_multi>) print(<spp_taxon>)

Print methods for objects of class spp_raw*

set_token() forget_token()

Login helper function

spp_cites_legislation()

Get current CITES appendix listings and reservations.

spp_distributions()

Get distributions data available for a given taxon concept.

spp_eu_legislation()

Get current EU annex listings, SRG opinions, and EU suspensions.

spp_references()

Get references for a given taxon concept

spp_taxonconcept()

Get taxon concepts for a search term.
